description:
The relationship between Erika and Hinageshi becomes strained. A duel between the big sister and the gamer begins.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Omoi o Tsutaete Saba to Kaki no Tamago Zousui: Kuzushi Kiritanpo Fuu
Wishing On Mackerel, Oyster, and Egg Zosui Soup Kuzushi Kiritampo Style
想いを伝えてサバと牡蠣の卵雑炊 崩しきりたんぽ風
